content: Happy New Year @Richard Ettema Many thanks for migrating the Touchstone Terminology Services Tests to C29. I've just run them through Terminz and all passed. The new Terminology Services Management Group has re-kindled interest in expanding this test suite and it would be great to schedule an hour with you at the Connectathon next week and/or if you could attend the Office Hours Session that I'm running in the TS Track (timing will be on Whova). @Davera Gabriel and @Rob Hausam are the Track Leads.

Hello @Richard Ettema Thank-you very much for your help. We have an hour on the agenda Monday, January 10 at 5pm Central time for that activity. Please let me know if you have additional questions, or I can be of any additional assistance
the track page is here: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/Terminology+Services And Peter's aforementioned session is on Tuesday, January 11, 2-3p CST

@Peter Jordan, @Davera Gabriel - Happy New Year!
I have set aside those times, added them to my Whova agenda and will be able to attend both sessions. Looking forward to catching up with you.
